tool_description: API allows you to send OTP SMS to Ghana numbers
name: ICSMS-GLOBAL
title: ICSMS-GLOBAL

api_list.name: Send SMS
api_list.description: This endpoint is for  sending the SMS
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://icsms-global.p.rapidapi.com/sendsms"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "icsms-global.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://icsms-global.p.rapidapi.com/sendsms"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "icsms-global.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
